question: Write a Java program to calculate the area of a circle.
solution: public class CircleArea { public static void main(String[] args) { float radius = 5; double area = Math.PI * (radius * radius); System.out.println("The area of the circle is " + area); } }

question: Write a Java program to convert Celsius to Fahrenheit.
solution: public class CelsiusToFahrenheit { public static void main(String[] args) { float celsius = 0; float fahrenheit = (celsius - 32) * 5/9; System.out.println("The temperature in Fahrenheit is " + fahrenheit); } }

question: Write a Java program to calculate the factorial of a given number.
hint: Factorial = n! = n x (n-1) x (n-2) ... x 1
solution: public class Factorial { public static void main(String[] args) { int n = 5; int result = 1; for (int i = n; i >= 1; i--) { result *= i; } System.out.println("The factorial of " + n + " is " + result); } }

question: Write a Java program to calculate the sum of digits of a given number.
hint: For example, if the number is 1234, the sum will be 1+2+3+4 = 10
solution: public class SumOfDigits { public static void main(String[] args) { int num = 1234; int sum = 0; while (num > 0) { sum += num % 10; num /= 10; } System.out.println("The sum of digits of " + num + " is " + sum); } }

question: Write a Java program to calculate the distance between two points on a coordinate plane.
solution: public class DistanceBetweenPoints { public static void main(String[] args) { int x1 = 3, y1 = 4; int x2 = 6, y2 = 8; double distance = Math.sqrt((x2 - x1) * (x2 - x1) + (y2 - y1) * (y2 - y1)); System.out.println("The distance between the two points is " + distance); } }

question: Write a Java program to calculate the area of a rectangle.
solution: public class RectangleArea { public static void main(String[] args) { int length = 5, breadth = 3; double area = length * breadth; System.out.println("The area of the rectangle is " + area); } }

question: Write a Java program to calculate the perimeter of a rectangle.
solution: public class RectanglePerimeter { public static void main(String[] args) { int length = 5, breadth = 3; double perimeter = 2 * (length + breadth); System.out.println("The perimeter of the rectangle is " + perimeter); } }

question: Write a Java program to calculate the area of a triangle.
solution: public class TriangleArea { public static void main(String[] args) { int base = 5, height = 6; double area = (base * height) / 2; System.out.println("The area of the triangle is " + area); } }

question: Write a Java program to calculate the perimeter of a triangle.
solution: public class TrianglePerimeter { public static void main(String[] args) { int base = 5, height = 6; double perimeter = base + (height * 2); System.out.println("The perimeter of the triangle is " + perimeter); } }

question: Write a Java program to calculate the volume of a cylinder.
hint: Volume = π x radius^2 x height
solution: public class CylinderVolume { public static void main(String[] args) { double pi = Math.PI; int radius = 5, height = 6; double volume = pi * (radius * radius) * height; System.out.println("The volume of the cylinder is " + volume); } }
